title: Does Blake Shelton have a place and or vacation spot/getaway in North carolina?
text: Hello. Thank you for reading MyReporter. The focus of MyReporter.com is answering questions about life in Southeastern North Carolina, which we define as Brunswick, New Hanover and Pender counties. ThatÍs where we devote our resources.  Here's a link to the answer to your question as it relates to our coverage area: http://www.myreporter.com/2017/03/does-blake-shelton-have-a-place-in-southeastern-north-carolina/
